en-US.name: More points
en-US.summary: Adds 10 more points to your total
en-US.description: Out of turns for the day? You can instantly add 10 more points to continue playing instead of waiting until the next day

customProductPrompts.purchasePromptDescription: You can immediately add 10 more points to continue your game.
customProductPrompts.boughtCardDescription: Congratulations! You can continue playing Three Card Poker.

testingInstructions: By buying this product, you will increase the number of points you have by 10. You can hear how many points you have left by asking for Help or after each game.
